contexts.title: XSS Vulnerability Contexts
contexts.description: Explore different XSS vulnerability contexts with detailed attack vectors and remediation strategies.

html_content.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in HTML Content
html_content.description: User input is reflected directly into the HTML body without proper sanitization...
html_content.attack_vector:
CLASSIC ATTACK VECTORS:

1. SCRIPT TAG INJECTION:
   <script>alert(document.cookie)</script>...
html_content.remediation:
DEFENSE-IN-DEPTH STRATEGY:

1. OUTPUT ENCODING (PRIMARY DEFENSE):
   HTML Entity Encoding...

websocket_xss.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in WebSocket Context
websocket_xss.description: WebSocket XSS occurs when user input is reflected into WebSocket messages...
websocket_xss.attack_vector:
WEBSOCKET XSS ATTACK VECTORS:

1. MESSAGE ECHO INJECTION:
   Server-side code: ws.send(userMessage)...
websocket_xss.remediation:
WEBSOCKET XSS DEFENSE STRATEGY:

1. MESSAGE SANITIZATION:
   Sanitize all outbound WebSocket messages...

IFRAME SANDBOX XSS DEFENSE STRATEGY:
